website_summaries.verdict: With a combination of leather and other original design touches, these sunglasses can ignite the context you choose.
pros: Not for the understated, these sunglasses can be worn indoors and outdoors and purely for your fashion statement
Centered by a piece of leather, this is a classic aviator design that's enhanced to look good on most
cons: Few customers note that their sunglasses showed up with missing pieces, and if this is the case, contact customer service immediately

website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those who like the aviator look combined with ornate accents. Suitable for men and women, although petite wearers may find the frame too large.
pros: Includes strong polycarbonate lenses, but will accept prescription lenses
Secure fit on bridge and ears
cons: Poorly constructed carrying case could damage the glasses

customer_reviews.title: Love this glasses
customer_reviews.text: I received them really quick and really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: ernesto flores

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!!
customer_reviews.text: My delivery just came in today. It was well packaged and delivered on time. I was very skeptical because of the low price so I checked with Versace to make sure it was real. It was and they look great!! Super happy
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: ... from Versace in crystal shops in Vegas and I loved them after 2 years of wear they needed replaced
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this from Versace in crystal shops in Vegas and I loved them after 2 years of wear they needed replaced. These were priced so good and said to be authentic so I figured why not. They pictured with the leather piece in the middle which in my opinion makes the glasses stand out from a basic aviator style. The glasses I was sent are missing that piece in the middle. So not sure if they’re authentic or what but was totally bummed i was not sent what I thought I was getting. I was offered 20 percent off to just keep the glasses which I did but still 100$ for glasses that don’t look like the originals.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Versace
customer_reviews.text: I love them they're beautiful and they are authentic I checked....
customer_reviews.author: AzuRam

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Authinic....i was a little sceptical after reading some of the comments...i already had a real pair to compare them to they were identical
customer_reviews.author: Cali dude

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and authentic.
customer_reviews.text: This came with the box and all the papers to show it is authentic. I even matched the serial number to the website. I bought this as a present for a trendy friend. It really made his day! The price was reasonable compared tomany other sources, but not the lowest as I wanted to buy from a trustworthy source.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical , because I though they were fake, I went to Macy's to the sunglasses department and compare these ones with the ones on the shelfs, and let me tell you these ones were definitely "Originals" for a much better price, they look amazing and I already got a lot complements . I recommend to buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shades and they make me look fabulous! Have them for about 3 months now and still love them. Get a lot of compliments everywhere I go!
customer_reviews.author: ashley pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Sexy pair of Versace.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for exactly the same shades I saw for double the price in retail stores. Made me love them even more, since my husband attempted to buy them several times at the local retailer. He listened to me once & waited. Very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioDiva 17

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake...do not be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the real Versace....fake! The leather on the nose already coming off...the lint cleaner rag is generic...nor versace and the case is cheap, the medusa face are not as detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: They Are Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I used the certilogo that came with these to determine that they are authentic. I am female, have a narrow face. They fit and do not fall off. Not too large, not too small. I purchased in white.
customer_reviews.author: TLF

customer_reviews.title: I Went to Dillard’s to try these on and they were fine not too big at all
customer_reviews.text: Too big wouldn’t stay on my head ! I Went to Dillard’s to try these on and they were fine not too big at all . Don’t understand why they are different sizes they’re supposed to be the same product. I trust Dillard’s more than these .
customer_reviews.author: Lillian R.

customer_reviews.title: quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were beautifully made and package. The problem was they didn't fit my face well. Aviator style- They would be great on the right face shape. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: American-Bonsai

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: They are real I see ppl in the reviews lying it comes with the verification card and you can go to Versace website and check that YES THEY ARE REAL!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rogers

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the shades are great good quality for the price. I got what I expected from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Lens quality is superb but ugliest sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: The visual quality of these glasses is absolutely superb. However, these are the ugliest and most gaudy sunglasses I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Received fake glasses what a disappointment. Do not recommend they are fake not even close to what the description said or the picture of the glasses
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sunglasses and have been getting compliments on them. Great if you're looking for sunglasses that stand out! I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Versace awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair. Completely in love with them. Fast shipping. Great customer service. Original. Definitely recommend to anyone who likes to keep stylish and classy. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Are these authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of this in January 2017 and always thought they were real because i was naive and thought that giant company like Amazon wouldn't allow fakes on their site. However after using it for almost 2 years I have noticed that it doesn't really block the sun's ray. I mean i could be wearing them during a bright sunny day and my eyes would still strain because of the glaring sun. Someone please assure me I didn't spend a hundred plus on a pair of fake Versace sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Ong

customer_reviews.title: You can be classy too!!
customer_reviews.text: Feel classy af wearing these!! They look great and comfortable. Plus nothing wrong with having style! Might buy another set in white!

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: feels and look real similar to versace shades i have, everything checks out good, very sporty and bold.

Before buying just be aware that the center medusa is even smaller than it appears to be in the photo...

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses. Careless packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses! However, the case that came with was not the case pictured. The one it came with seemed too small for the sunglasses. Also when I opened the shipping box and pulled the glasses out the lense on the right side was completely popped out, rattling in the box. Not sure if it was from the shipping company or seller but it was disappointing. I was able to pop it back into place. I didn't want to return because they were such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Six

customer_reviews.title: 100% Falke, Do Not waste your time or money!!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are 100% fake. Lens are falling out of the frame. Did not come with book of authenticity. Had to send it back once due to scratched lens. Receipt included is from Hong Kong. DO NOT BUY THESE. 100% FAKE. It contains a very poorly translated card instead of the Versache booklet it should have.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Versace Women's Medusa Aviator Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Versace sunglasses in a dramatic aviator shape. A signature Medusa face accents the leather-wrapped bridge, and intricate etchings detail the extra-wide arms. Hard case and cleaning cloth included.
